snippet: Malawi’s new president, Joyce Banda, announced Tuesday that an investigation had been opened into the death last year of an activist who had criticized her predecessor, President Bingu wa Mutharika.
abstract: Malawi's new president Joyce Banda announces an investigation into the 2011 death of activist Robert Chasowa, who had criticized her predecessor, Pres Bingu wa Mutharika.
lead_paragraph: Malawi’s new president, Joyce Banda, announced Tuesday that an investigation had been opened into the death last year of an activist who had criticized her predecessor, President Bingu wa Mutharika.
